Key.Original: If you enable this setting the scanner will display 3 ace actions.(effects of each action can be coded below).
Key.English: If you enable this setting the scanner will display 3 ace actions.(effects of each action can be coded below).
Key.French: Si vous activez ce réglage le scanner offrira 3 actions ace. Les effets de ces actions peuvent être codés dans les champs ci-dessous.

Key.Original: Code to run when the main touchscreen is used.
Key.English: Code to run when the main touchscreen is used.
Key.French: Code a executer lorsque l'écran tactile est utilisé.

Key.Original: The following code will run when the main screen action is used, after the videos are played on the screen. Variables _scanner and _player are passed to the code.
Key.English: The following code will run when the main screen action is used, after the videos are played on the screen. Variables _scanner and _player are passed to the code.
Key.French: Le code suivant sera executé quand l'écran tactile est utilisé, après que les vidéos soient jouées sur l'écran. Les variables _scanner et _player sont disponibles dans le code.

Key.Original: Code to run when the hand scanner is used.
Key.English: Code to run when the hand scanner is used.
Key.French: Code à executer quand le scanner digital est utiliser.

Key.Original: The following code will run when the hand scanner action is used, after the videos are played on the screen. Variables _scanner and _player are passed to the code.
Key.English: The following code will run when the hand scanner action is used, after the videos are played on the screen. Variables _scanner and _player are passed to the code.
Key.French: Le code suivant sera executé quand le scanner digital est utilisé, après que les vidéos soient jouées sur l'écran. Les variables _scanner et _player sont disponibles dans le code.

Key.Original: Code to run when the eye scanner is used.
Key.English: Code to run when the eye scanner is used.
Key.French: Code a executer quand le scanner oculaire est utilisé.

Key.Original: The following code will run when the eye scanner action is used, after the videos are played on the screen. Variables _scanner and _player are passed to the code.
Key.English: The following code will run when the eye scanner action is used, after the videos are played on the screen. Variables _scanner and _player are passed to the code.
Key.French: Le code suivant sera executé quand le scanner oculaire est utilisé, après que les vidéos soient jouées sur l'écran. Les variables _scanner et _player sont disponibles dans le code.
Contrôler la porte la plus proche

Key.Original: If this setting is enabled the scanner will control closing, opening and locking of the nearest door (from the main screen action only), from the nearest building,requires 'use ace action setting' to be enabled. Door will be locked at mission start. Might not work with non vanilla buildings.
Key.English: If this setting is enabled the scanner will control closing, opening and locking of the nearest door (from the main screen action only), from the nearest building,requires 'use ace action setting' to be enabled. Door will be locked at mission start. Might not work with non vanilla buildings.
Key.French: Si ce réglage est activé le scanner controlera l'ouverture, la fermeture et le verouillage de la porte la plus proche, dans le bâtiment le plus proche (via l'action de l'écran tactile seulement), requiert le réglage 'utiliser les actions ace' activé. La porte sera vérouillée au début de la mission. Peut ne pas marcher avec des bâtiments issus de mods.

Key.Original: Condition to open lock the door
Key.English: Condition to open lock the door

Key.Original: Code, scripting the required conditions to unlock the door, can be anything, must return BOOL
Key.English: Code, scripting the required conditions to unlock the door, can be anything, must return BOOL
Key.French: Code, qui scripte les conditions requises pour ouvrir la porte, peut être n'importe quoi mais doit retourner une valeur BOOLEENNE

Key.Original: Force using eye scanner before unlocking
Key.English: Force using eye scanner before unlocking
Key.French: Forcer l'utilisation du scanner oculaire avant de dévérouiller.

Key.Original: If this setting is enabled players will have to first use the eye scanner (in a short period of time) before being able to unlock the door by the main screen.
Key.English: If this setting is enabled players will have to first use the eye scanner (in a short period of time) before being able to unlock the door by the main screen.
Key.French: Si ce réglage est activé les joueurs devront utiliser le scanner oculaire avant de pouvoir dévérouiller la porte avec l'écran principal (durée limitée).

Key.Original: Force using hand scanner before unlocking
Key.English: Force using hand scanner before unlocking
Key.French: Forcer l'utilisation du scanner digital avant de dévérouiller.

Key.Original: If this setting is enabled players will have to first use the hand scanner (in a short period of time) before being able to unlock the door by the main screen.
Key.English: If this setting is enabled players will have to first use the hand scanner (in a short period of time) before being able to unlock the door by the main screen.
Key.French: Si ce réglage est activé les joueurs devront utiliser le scanner digital avant de pouvoir dévérouiller la porte avec l'écran principal (durée limitée).
Autoriser le piratage de ce terminal

Key.Original: If this setting is enabled a player will be able to hack the scanner(with the hacking tool),thus bypassing all above conditions. (only for the player that performed the hack)
Key.English: If this setting is enabled a player will be able to hack the scanner(with the hacking tool),thus bypassing all above conditions. (only for the player that performed the hack)
Key.French: Si ce réglage est activé un joueur sera en mesure de pirater le scanner (avec l'outil de piratage), ce qui lui permettra de bypasser les conditions ci-dessus. (valable seulement pour le joueur qui a fait le piratage).

Key.Original: Variable name of the building to control. If a variable name is set for the building the scanner will control the nearest door in given building, otherwise it will control the nerates door in the nearest building.
Key.English: Variable name of the building to control. If a variable name is set for the building the scanner will control the nearest door in given building, otherwise it will control the nerates door in the nearest building.
Key.French: Nom de varaiable du bâtiment à contrôler. Si un nom de variable de bâtiment est donné le scanner contrôlera la porte de ce bâtiment la plus proche de sa position, sinon il contrôlera la porte la plus proche du bâtiment le plus proche.
